# Venomfire (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Acid Spells|acid]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]]

**Components:** V, M

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Serpent Kingdoms (WotC), pg. 158

You cause the subjectâ€™s venom to become caustic, dealing an additional 1d6 points of acid damage per caster level with each use. This spell has no effect on creatures that do not naturally produce poison.

*Material Component:* A drop of acid.
